Factsheet

Developer:
Lucas Demo
Based in Curitiba, Brazil
Release date:
Platforms:
PC - Steam
Website:
knockbacky.github.io
Regular Price:
US$ 3,99

Description

Use explosion immunity and a ROCKET LAUNCHER to escape the prison, making explosive and risky moves across the level!

History

Features

  • - More than 40 levels
  • - Speed Runnable
  • - Local COOP game mode
  • - Local VERSUS game mode
  • - Unique BOSS FIGHTS
  • - Unlock new Prisoners
